entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 2000 metres. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm near Lake Louise. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
